title: Looking for people to play ranked with (supp main)
body:
Not necessarily after a duo or a team (unless someone is offering) since i'm not on every day/for long periods, just looking for more people to play ranked games with.
Basically, if you have empty spots in your premade, i'm always keen to help out.

I mainly play Support roles, and dabble in a bit of jg. Been playing since release, but never really got into ranked.

~~Main is Karma {{champion:43}}~~ 

_edit:_ **Have benched Karma for the time being and am having a really fun time playing Taric support; and i have reached mastery 7 with him in a short time;** 

but am decent with more obscure, less-played supports like Sion, Viktor, Tahm and Poppy.
i play these types of champs because of the unpredictability compared to the usual meta.
My go-to junglers are usually Skarner and Sion, but looking to expand on this eventually.
Most supports i play can also do fine jungling (except Karma is not as effective gank-wise)

Currently in ~~Silver V in season 6~~ **_Bronze 2 for season 7_**, having a lot of win streaks, then loss streaks, so a big reason for this post is to find other people so my games have a bit more team reliability (skillwise).

Hit me up and just **_mention this post_** so i know what your message is about. Thanks!

Oceania
Name: skinnerz
role(s): Supp/top/fill

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=skinnerz

replies.body: im happy to play ranked with you, im a top main i prioritise {{champion:157}}  if he isnt banned but if he is i can play a powerful {{champion:36}}
